FileFormat.FormatDescription: BDOC is a digital signature format developed in 2014 to replace the old DDOC (DigiDoc) digital signature format in Estonia. Compared to DDOC, an important modification is that a .bdoc file is in fact a ZIP container with the signed files, the signatures and the protocol control information and can be opened by any program that recognises the ZIP format.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: The National Archives of Estonia / The National Archives of Estonia
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: This format can be identified via a container signature in DROID version 6 or later. The PRONOM database cannot currently represent container signatures.
FileFormat.FormatNote: https://www.id.ee/?lang=en&id=34336. Standard: EVS 821:2009 BDOC - Format for Digital Signatures https://www.evs.ee/products/evs-821-2009
